sections.heading: Prior approval of adoptive placementNo child who is the subject of an intercountry adoption shall be placed in the home of the prospective adoptive parents prior to their obtaining a certification for adoption that meets the requirements of Articles 1171 through 1173 and prior to approval from the U
sections.text: Prior approval of adoptive placementNo child who is the subject of an intercountry adoption shall be placed in the home of the prospective adoptive parents prior to their obtaining a certification for adoption that meets the requirements of Articles 1171 through 1173 and prior to approval from the United States Citizenship and Immigration Services.Acts 1999, No. 1268, ยง1; Acts 2013, No. 86, ยง1.
